message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, $120 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping to get. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $160?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
